Lady Chizuruko is furious!\""},{"lineNumber":39722,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おさらばですー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm off—farewell!\""},{"lineNumber":39723,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こら！　待ちなさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, wait!\""},{"lineNumber":39724,"originalJapaneseLine":"アニスはぴゅっぴゅーと姿を消してしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Anise suddenly disappeared with a whoosh."},{"lineNumber":39725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「逃げたわね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She ran away, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":39726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ…………まったく、あの子は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh... Honestly, that girl...\""},{"lineNumber":39727,"originalJapaneseLine":"額に指を当て、千鶴子は溜息をこぼした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Placing a finger on her forehead, Chizuruko let out a sigh."},{"lineNumber":39728,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、少し恨みがましい目でランスを見る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, she looked at Rance with a slightly resentful gaze."},{"lineNumber":39729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……聞かせて貰っていいかしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...May I hear about it?\""},{"lineNumber":39730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「話すほどのことはないがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There isn't much to tell.\""},{"lineNumber":39731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は、御両親からアニスをお預かりしているの。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've been entrusted with Anise by her parents."},{"lineNumber":39732,"originalJapaneseLine":"　意に沿わず傷物になっていたり、","translatedEnglishLine":"If she ends up hurt or damaged against their wishes,"},{"lineNumber":39733,"originalJapaneseLine":"　監督不行届になっていたら、申し訳が立たないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It would be unforgivable for me to neglect my supervision.\""},{"lineNumber":39734,"originalJapaneseLine":"「別にいいだろ。ガキじゃあるまいし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's fine, isn't it? She's not a child."},{"lineNumber":39735,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、おつむはガキみたいなもんだが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, her brain might be like a kid's though...\""},{"lineNumber":39736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうはいきません。保護者として当然です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That won't do. It's only natural as a guardian.\""},{"lineNumber":39737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん……意外と固いな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... you're surprisingly strict.\""},{"lineNumber":39738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃそうでしょ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course... "},{"lineNumber":39739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うちの親父みたいなのがおかしいのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's my father who's the strange one.\""},{"lineNumber":39740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「千鶴子さん、戻ってきませんね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Chizuruko-san hasn't come back...\""},{"lineNumber":39741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アニスでも探しにいったのかもしれないわね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe she went to look for Anise.\""},{"lineNumber":39742,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスから一部始終を聞いた千鶴子は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Having heard the whole story from Rance,"},{"lineNumber":39743,"originalJapaneseLine":"席を外すと言ったきりだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko had said she'd step out and hadn't returned."},{"lineNumber":39744,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……待ってても仕方ないわね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...There's no point in waiting."},{"lineNumber":39745,"originalJapaneseLine":"　残りの説明を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let me explain the rest...\""},{"lineNumber":39746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":39747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やっほー……あら懐かしい顔」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey there... Oh, what a familiar face.\""},{"lineNumber":39748,"originalJapaneseLine":"だしぬけに、ノックも無しに会議室の扉が開いて","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, without knocking, the conference room door opened,"},{"lineNumber":39749,"originalJapaneseLine":"パパイア・サーバーが姿を見せた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Papaya Sarver appeared."},{"lineNumber":39750,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、マッドサイエンティスト！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, mad scientist!\""},{"lineNumber":39751,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ、しっつれーね。もう正気よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, sorry about that. I'm sane now.\""},{"lineNumber":39752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……そうだったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... that's right."},{"lineNumber":39753,"originalJapaneseLine":"　久しぶりだな、パパイア」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's been a while, Papaya.\""},{"lineNumber":39754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お久しぶりです、パパイアさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Long time no see, Papaya-san.\""},{"lineNumber":39755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁい、もこもこちゃんも久しぶり。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hi there, Mokomoko-chan, long time no see too."},{"lineNumber":39756,"originalJapaneseLine":"　氷漬けだったんだって？　変わってないわねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard you were frozen? You haven't changed at all.\""},{"lineNumber":39757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あはは……そうでしょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, haha... Do you really think so?\""},{"lineNumber":39758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっとパパイア。急に出てきて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Papaya. Suddenly showing up and,"},{"lineNumber":39759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　親戚のおばちゃんみたいな会話やめてくれる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could you stop talking like some auntie relative?\""},{"lineNumber":39760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、会議中？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, a meeting?"},{"lineNumber":39761,"originalJapaneseLine":"　千鶴子に用があったんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I had business with Chizuruko...\""},{"lineNumber":39762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そのうち帰ってくると思うわ。急用？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I think she'll come back eventually. Is it urgent?\""},{"lineNumber":39763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んーん、そこまでじゃないわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, not that urgent."},{"lineNumber":39764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　待たせてもらっていい？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can I wait here?\""},{"lineNumber":39765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まあ、構わないけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well, I don't mind.\""},{"lineNumber":39766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、お知り合いの方ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, is she someone you know?\""},{"lineNumber":39767,"originalJapaneseLine":"香姫が、こっそりシィルに耳打ちした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaki whispered secretly to Sil."},{"lineNumber":39768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、パパイアさんと言って、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, her name is Papaya,"},{"lineNumber":39769,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスの元四天王の方です。","translatedEnglishLine":"She used to be one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Zeth."},{"lineNumber":39770,"originalJapaneseLine":"　優秀な魔法研究者さんなんですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"She's an excellent magical researcher.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あわわわわ！　千鶴子様が怒髪天！
おさらばですー！」
「あ、こら！　待ちなさい！」
アニスはぴゅっぴゅーと姿を消してしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anise suddenly disappeared with a whoosh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逃げたわね……」
「はあ…………まったく、あの子は……」
額に指を当て、千鶴子は溜息をこぼした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Placing a finger on her forehead, Chizuruko let out a sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、少し恨みがましい目でランスを見る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, she looked at Rance with a slightly resentful gaze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……聞かせて貰っていいかしら？」
「話すほどのことはないがな」
「私は、御両親からアニスをお預かりしているの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've been entrusted with Anise by her parents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意に沿わず傷物になっていたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If she ends up hurt or damaged against their wishes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 監督不行届になっていたら、申し訳が立たないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be unforgivable for me to neglect my supervision."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「別にいいだろ。ガキじゃあるまいし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's fine, isn't it? She's not a child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、おつむはガキみたいなもんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, her brain might be like a kid's though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうはいきません。保護者として当然です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That won't do. It's only natural as a guardian."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん……意外と固いな」
「そりゃそうでしょ……
うちの親父みたいなのがおかしいのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's my father who's the strange one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「千鶴子さん、戻ってきませんね……」
「アニスでも探しにいったのかもしれないわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe she went to look for Anise."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスから一部始終を聞いた千鶴子は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having heard the whole story from Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 席を外すと言ったきりだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko had said she'd step out and hadn't returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……待ってても仕方ないわね。
残りの説明を……」
「やっほー……あら懐かしい顔」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey there... Oh, what a familiar face."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だしぬけに、ノックも無しに会議室の扉が開いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, without knocking, the conference room door opened,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパイア・サーバーが姿を見せた。
「うっ、マッドサイエンティスト！」
「あれ、しっつれーね。もう正気よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, sorry about that. I'm sane now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む……そうだったな。
久しぶりだな、パパイア」
「お久しぶりです、パパイアさん」
「はぁい、もこもこちゃんも久しぶり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hi there, Mokomoko-chan, long time no see too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷漬けだったんだって？　変わってないわねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard you were frozen? You haven't changed at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あはは……そうでしょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, haha... Do you really think so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっとパパイア。急に出てきて、
親戚のおばちゃんみたいな会話やめてくれる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you stop talking like some auntie relative?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、会議中？
千鶴子に用があったんだけど……」
「……そのうち帰ってくると思うわ。急用？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I think she'll come back eventually. Is it urgent?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーん、そこまでじゃないわ。
待たせてもらっていい？」
「……まあ、構わないけど」
「あの、お知り合いの方ですか？」
香姫が、こっそりシィルに耳打ちした。
「はい、パパイアさんと言って、
ゼスの元四天王の方です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She used to be one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優秀な魔法研究者さんなんですよ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, sorry about that. I'm sane now."

「はぁい、もこもこちゃんも久しぶり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hi there, Mokomoko-chan, long time no see too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷漬けだったんだって？　変わってないわねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard you were frozen? You haven't changed at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あはは……そうでしょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, haha... Do you really think so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっとパパイア。急に出てきて、
親戚のおばちゃんみたいな会話やめてくれる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you stop talking like some auntie relative?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、会議中？
千鶴子に用があったんだけど……」
「……そのうち帰ってくると思うわ。急用？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I think she'll come back eventually. Is it urgent?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーん、そこまでじゃないわ。
待たせてもらっていい？」
「……まあ、構わないけど」
「あの、お知り合いの方ですか？」
香姫が、こっそりシィルに耳打ちした。
「はい、パパイアさんと言って、
ゼスの元四天王の方です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She used to be one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優秀な魔法研究者さんなんですよ」
